		  languages and various technologies like java,python and web development.I worked on various projects related to the

		  I was also the winner of the internal SIH and our project was virtual mouse.I have also interest in data strucute and
		  algorithms.I am an energetic person, an effective communicator, and a quick learner.

Strength:I am an energetic person, an effective communicator, and a quick learner and hardworker.I can lead the team if needed.
